entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as spotting Wormtail within seconds, indicating that he is a person who can observe and react quickly.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as a small, mousy-haired boy with a pointed nose, indicating that he is a person with distinct physical characteristics.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is described as doodling on a bit of scrap parchment, indicating that he is a person who is engaged in an activity.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is described as collecting parchment and being knocked off his feet by the sudden movement, indicating that he is a person who is in charge of the class.

entities.name: stebbins
entities.description: Stebbins is mentioned as needing to remain seated while Professor Flitwick collects parchment, indicating that he is a person who is present in the class.

relationships.description: Harry observes Wormtail within seconds, indicating that Harry has noticed Wormtail's anxious behavior.
James is doodling next to Harry, indicating that they are physically close to each other.
Professor Flitwick interacts with Stebbins by telling him to remain seated, indicating that they have a relationship as teacher and student.
Professor Flitwick collects parchment from the students, indicating that he has possession of it.
